articles.title: NOMINATIONS ANNOUNCED FOR THE 31ST ANNUAL CRITICS CHOICE AWARDS HOSTED BY CHELSEA HANDLER – Critics Choice Association - Critics Choice
articles.description: The Critics Choice Association (CCA) announced today the nominees for the 31st annual Critics Choice Awards with an exclusive broadcast across E! and USA Network linear channels and digital platforms. The winners will be revealed at the Critics Choice Awards …

articles.author: Joe Flint, Lauren Thomas
articles.title: Netflix to Buy Warner Bros. After Split for $72 Billion - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Warner Bros. is to split its studios and HBO Max streaming business from its cable networks. Paramount and Comcast also made offers.
articles.content:

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: At least 4 countries pull out of 2026 Eurovision contest over Israel’s participation - NPR
articles.description: Ireland, the Netherlands, Spain and Slovenia said they were pulling out of the contest after organizers decided to allow Israel to continue to compete, despite tensions over its conduct in Gaza.
articles.content: GENEVA Public broadcasters in Ireland, the Netherlands, Spain and Slovenia on Thursday pulled out of next year's Eurovision Song Contest after organizers decided to allow Israel to compete, putting p… [+5771 chars]
